pr_title: Clarify exception message when ALPN is not supported

timeline.bodyText:
This seems to not be true anymore. Starting 1.8.0u252, ALPN is supported.
(see https://www.eclipse.org/jetty/documentation/current/alpn-chapter.html#alpn-versions)
timeline.author: cescoffier

replies.bodyText: oh interesting... Didn't know this was backported.
replies.author: normanmaurer

replies.bodyText: So, the jdkAlpnSupported method should be updated to handle this "new feature".
replies.author: cescoffier

replies.bodyText: @cescoffier working on a PR as we speak
replies.author: normanmaurer

timeline.message:
Clarify exception message when ALPN is not supported

Motivation:

We should provide more informations when ALPN is not supported and a user tries to use it.

Modifications:

- Use UnsupportedOperationException

Result:

Easier to debug ALPN problems
